analysis.description:
LockableToken.push_or_update_key (/unique_chucks/14/0xbd37cf2e37d18e944a140e483d121bbee0607bca.sol#592-606) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- lockedKeys[i] == 0

LockableToken.push_or_update_key (/unique_chucks/14/0xbd37cf2e37d18e944a140e483d121bbee0607bca.sol#592-606) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- lockedKeys[i] == 0
LockableToken.releaseLockedBalance (/unique_chucks/14/0xbd37cf2e37d18e944a140e483d121bbee0607bca.sol#551-574) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- theTime == 0 || lockedBalances[theTime] == 0

Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/14/0xbd37cf2e37d18e944a140e483d121bbee0607bca.sol:
	Contract PALToken8 has payable functions:
	 - transferLockedToken (/unique_chucks/14/0xbd37cf2e37d18e944a140e483d121bbee0607bca.sol#520-547)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

PALToken8.decimals should be constant (/unique_chucks/14/0xbd37cf2e37d18e944a140e483d121bbee0607bca.sol)
PALToken8.name should be constant (/unique_chucks/14/0xbd37cf2e37d18e944a140e483d121bbee0607bca.sol)
